properties.description: Notebook to simplify the json generated by form recognizer

source:
L1TransformInstanceID = None
L1TransformID = None
IngestID = None
CustomParameters = None
InputRawFileSystem = None
InputRawFileFolder = None
InputRawFile = None
InputRawFileDelimiter = None
InputFileHeaderFlag = None
OutputL1CurateFileSystem = None
OutputL1CuratedFolder = None
OutputL1CuratedFile = None
OutputL1CuratedFileDelimiter = None
OutputL1CuratedFileFormat = None
OutputL1CuratedFileWriteMode = None
OutputDWStagingTable = None
LookupColumns = None
OutputDWTable = None
OutputDWTableWriteMode = None
ReRunL1TransformFlag = None
DeltaName = None

# # Parameters for Testing only, should be commented off
# L1TransformInstanceID = 2
# L1TransformID = 1
# IngestID = 2
# CustomParameters = None
# InputRawFileSystem = 'raw-bronze'
# InputRawFileFolder = 're-statements/2024/08'
# InputRawFile = '2024-08-25_182410_re-statement.json'
# InputRawFileDelimiter = None
# InputFileHeaderFlag = None
# OutputL1CurateFileSystem = 'curated-silver'
# OutputL1CuratedFolder = 're-statements/2024/08'
# OutputL1CuratedFile = 'standardized_2024-08-25_182504_re-statement.json'
# OutputL1CuratedFileDelimiter = None
# OutputL1CuratedFileFormat = 'json'
# OutputL1CuratedFileWriteMode = 'overwrite'
# OutputDWStagingTable = None
# LookupColumns = None
# OutputDWTable = None
# OutputDWTableWriteMode = None
# ReRunL1TransformFlag = None
# DeltaName = None

from pyspark.sql.functions import col, explode
df = readFile(InputRawFileSystem, InputRawFileFolder +"/" + InputRawFile, None, None)
ingestCount = df.count()

# extract datapoints of interest and explode array

# df.printSchema()
df = df.select(col("RE agency.valueString").alias("re_agency")
            ,col("owner.valueString").alias("owner")
            ,col("owner address.valueString").alias("re_agency_address")
            ,col("rental address.valueString").alias("rental_address")
            ,col("statement date.valueString").alias("statement_date")
            ,col("tenant.valueString").alias("tenant")
            ,col("total payment.valueNumber").alias("total_payment")
            ,explode(col("statement details.valueArray")).alias("statement details")
            )

df = df.select("re_agency","owner","re_agency_address","rental_address","statement_date","tenant","total_payment"
                ,col("statement details.valueObject.amount.valueString").alias("item_amount")
                ,col("statement details.valueObject.item description.valueString").alias("item_description"))
# df.printSchema()

#write flattened json to curated zone of data lake
l1TransformCount = df.count()
writeFile(df,OutputL1CurateFileSystem, OutputL1CuratedFolder + "/" + OutputL1CuratedFile)
